    • ticketActionEmail

      public void ticketActionEmail​(java.lang.String userEmail, java.lang.String assigneeEmail, java.lang.String subjectLine, java.lang.String message)
      Email service to send update emails based on the ticket action performed.
      Parameters:
      userEmail - , gathered from the username from the ticket that is being actioned
      assigneeEmail - , gathered from the assignee from the ticket that is being actioned
      subjectLine - , used to provide a customized subject line based on the action performed on the ticket
      message - , used to provide a customized message text based on the action performed.
